data.title: Johnny Mercer Theatre
data.meta_description: The Johnny Mercer Theatre which seats 2,566 and boasts one of the largest prosceniums in the Southeast
data.text:
The Box Office is currently operating under normal hours.

Tickets can be purchased at the box office or online at Ticketmaster.com.

​

Hours: Monday - Friday 10:00am - 4:00pm

Phone: 912.651.6550

​

On Event days that fall on Saturday, Sunday or Holidays, the Box Office will open 3 hours prior to the event start.

The Johnny Mercer Theatre is an official partner of Ticketmaster. All tickets are sold through Ticketmaster. All tickets at The Johnny Mercer Theatre are SafeTix. A mobile device is required. All SafeTix tickets allow users to gain access to the venue by Rotating Entrey Token (RET), NFC Apple Wallet pass, or RFID ticket instead of a barcode. You must be the original ticket owner to enter the venue. Screenshots of tickets, or printed QR and barcodes will not be accepted at the Johnny Mercer Theatre.
